reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made, soft, and appreciate that the color matches the picture exactly.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater. Great quality, fit, and material very soft.
items.body: A little more poison green than emerald. I am usually a small but bought a medium for a more relaxed fit. It was not too much bigger than a small so it was better to size up. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fine, but won’t wear again
items.body: This sweater was used for a costume. I originally purchased it because it looked longer and thinner than most other sweaters I saw when searching. However, it’s quite short and bulky. It also was very itchy which made it a bit uncomfortable to wear. I purchased based on the suggestions on size and it was fine, but I was hoping for a sweater with more give - there was no stretch at all, telling me the materials aren’t the greatest. It was warm though! Which is great, and overall, it did its job. Read more
items.author: Angie Chiconas

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Sweater-Color Inaccurate
items.body: It’s a nice sweater, soft, medium weight and fits true to size. Unfortunately it’s not a nice pink like in the picture. Instead the color has heavy grey tones. It isn’t a heather pink either. It looks dull and actually almost a dirty pink. Too much hassle to return it so I’ll keep it just to wear around the house, running errands, etc. Would not wear on dates or anywhere like that though. The color flatters no one. Read more
items.author: CMT

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater but…
items.body: Returned. Nice quality sweater but runs small Read more
items.author: Tracy L. Baker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft but short
items.body: Really cute but kind of short Read more
items.author: Rachael

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy sweater
items.body: Super cute excellent color comfy sweater Read more
items.author: M House

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Material on the rougher side
items.body: This sweater is pretty and a good staple sweater to go with most things, jeans, dress pants, skirts or even under a vest. I ordered a medium, which fit nicely but I also could have went down in size and still be ok for a slightly tighter look. The color was a little more yellowish cream than what I would have liked but still looked good. The one negative thing I can say is that the material is not very soft and somewhat scratchy. Something underneath might be necessary for some. If you can deal with that, it’s a decent sweater. Read more
items.author: KLV

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fits small. Size up.
items.body: The top was nice, but it fits small. Had to return. Read more
items.author: Suzanne Lewis

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige, Burgundy, Grey Blue, Black, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
